text: Guido Crosetto (born 19 September, 1963) is an Italian politician and businessman. He co-founded the Brothers of Italy (FdI) party. He is a critic of the European Union. Crosetto was president of FdI from 21 December 2012 to 4 April 2013. In October 2022, he was appointed by Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni as Minister of Defence. ==Notes== ==References== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Italian mayors Category:Politicians from Piedmont
title: Guido Crosetto
